    • generateRandomPos

      public int generateRandomPos()
      Creates a random number between 0 and 63 in order to place the beggining pipe in a random node
      Returns:
      x random position

    • printBoard

      public String printBoard()

    • getPipeType

      public String getPipeType(int opc)
      return a type of pipe as a string according to the option given
      Parameters:
      opc - option of pipe
      Returns:
      type of pipe (0: F, 1: =, 2: ||, 3: o, 4: D)

    • addPipe

      public boolean addPipe(int x, int y, int type)
      Add pipe according to the coordinates of the node in the board

      If the position of the new pipe is an out of the board bounds, or it is to be located in the place of the end or start pipe, the pipe is not added

      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the node (in base 0)
      y - y coordinate of the node (in base 0)
      type - number corresponding to the option of the pipe type
      Returns:
      if the pipe could be added or not

    • addPipe

      public void addPipe(int index, int type)
      Adds pipe according to the number of the node
      Parameters:
      index - position of the node
      type - number corresponding to the option of the pipe type

    • calculatePos

      public int calculatePos(int x, int y)
      Calculated the number of the node (in a LinkedList of 64 nodes) according to its location in an 8x8 display.
      Parameters:
      x - coordinate x of the node
      y - coordinate y of the node
      Returns:
      int representing the number of the node that corresponds to said coordinate

    • calculateScore

      public long calculateScore()
      Method used to calculate the players score MUST ONLY BE USED IF METHOD VERIFIED IS TRUE, because only if the game is right, the player enters the ranking
      Returns:
      score of the player

    • getOverallPlayTime

      public long getOverallPlayTime(long start, long end)
      Calculates the length of the game of the user
      Parameters:
      start - start time of the game in miliseconds
      end - end time of the game in miliseconds
      Returns:
      out overall play time in seconds

    • verify

      public boolean verify()
      Verifies if this BoardGame is correctly developed

      if true, takes the time in miliseconds

      Returns:
      (true: the pipe system is correctly build) (false: there's a mistake in the result)

    • isSuccesful

      public boolean isSuccesful(util.Node actual, int direction)
      Verifies wheter the water flow is correctly built

      Checks the current node, if the next node in the flow is correct (according to the game rules), checks the next node in the flow.

      Otherwise, if the user placed a pipe incorrectly, returns false

      Parameters:
      actual - node that is being evaluated
      direction - direction of the flow of the water (1: hacia la izq) (2: hacia la der) (3: hacia arriba) (4: hacia abajo)
      Returns:
      (true: the pipe system is correctly build) (false: there's a pipe wronly placed or the game is not finished

    • moveOfLineDown

      public util.Node moveOfLineDown(util.Node actual)
      Parameters:
      actual - node being evaluated
      Returns:
      node that is 8 nodes below the actual node (node below in the board game)

    • moveOfLineUp

      public util.Node moveOfLineUp(util.Node actual)
      Parameters:
      actual - node being evaluated
      Returns:
      node that is 8 nodes on top the actual node (node from the previous line in the board game)
